title: Designing a Framework for Analyzing Mathematical Learners to Enhance Cultural Competence

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic mathematical concepts and ability to utilize online learning tools
context.additional_context: Job-integrated mathematics education program for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain differences in mathematical problem-solving strategies based on cultural backgrounds through case analysis
Learners complete a comparative project on mathematical approaches with multicultural team members using LMS-based collaboration tools
Learners design a learner analysis framework by applying three or more cultural cognitive style models
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
